companies_mast_desc: Here you can find companies you might be interested in.
mast_text: Korea Online Trade Meeting is one of the premier Trade Meet for small and medium-sized enterprises in Korea. Join us for our Online Trade Meeting and discover how dynamic Korean technologies and qualities can be!
home_1_title: From anywhere by your convenience, with your computer or phone.
home_1_text: Korea Online Trade Meet is held online. This means as long as you have access to the internet, with any smart devices or a computer, you can meet companies you are interested in.
home_2_title: A wide selection of different companies and products
home_2_text: We have a wide selection of companies and products that you can choose from across a variety of industries.
home_cat_text: These are the product categories that will be shown online during the event.
home_products_text: Here are some products that will be available.
covid_notice: ðŸ˜· Due to COVID-19, our Trade Meet will be held online.
products_mast_desc: Here you can find products you might be interested in.
apply_form_mast_desc: After we receive your application, our staff will do their best to contact you via e-mail and, or mobile.
form_success_title: You have successfully applied for G-Fair 2021!
form_success_text:
We have sent you an e-mail on details of your applications.
Our staff will get back to you as soon as possible.
